name: places/ChIJK6f_N99ZwokRmSb3fH454q4
formattedAddress: 364 W 23rd St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 364 W 23rd St, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: Dropped off at 7:45am. I just walked into the place on a Thursday with 2 big bags of really smelly laundry during our trip to NYC with 4 teenagers. Really dirty socks from sweaty feet and a week's worth of all types of clothes. Asked for same day service at drop off. Came back at 5:45pm and it was folded neatly and sorted. Cost was about $45 for it. Smells good. Totally worth it. They charge by the pound of dirty clothes. Saved me 3 hours at a laundry on a trip. The guy was friendly at drop off and pick up. Folding was really impressive and included in the price. The folded clean laundry was all in 1 bag at pickup. Highly recommend for a time saver on a trip.

originalText.text:
This place is not honest with their pricing. the website states 3 pricing options for laundry that are all per pound. Even in the FAQ's they only mention per pound pricing and the pickup person confirms the per pound price. Then they suddenly charge you $95 for washing one blanket & one comforter. It is obviously fine for them to have different prices for blankets but they need to be honest and state that on their website vs being underhanded and charging an outrageous price and then saying "well what you gonna do? You have to pay us now."
This is a dishonest business practice and I will not be using their service again.

originalText.text:
So I am very reluctant to send my clothing out from horrible experience from other places but I have been extremely busy with work and traveling so I decided to give Laundry Project 23 a try. I must say I am EXTREMELY PLEASED with their service and communication.

I emailed them a question and got a response within the hour. They picked up my laundry at 8am and it was waiting for me when I got home from work, before 5pm.

My laundry smelled clean, my clothing was folded and packed nicely, my dresses were hung with care, my sheets, towels and comforters were folded and packed professionally.

They just gained a happy new customer. Thank you so much for your great service.

originalText.text: Absolutely fantastic experience- I walked in as an overseas tourist with a bag full of sweaty summer clothes this morning and got to collect them tonight, looking and smelling like new. I wish my laundry at home would turn out this way. The icing of cake for me was that the friendly owner Joey still remembered my order without even having to check my order label, given the fact the shop was superbusy both in the morning and evening. Thank you for your fantastic service and all the best for you. :)

originalText.text: They were supposed to pick up my clothes from the motel but never went to pick them up. Only found out when I returned that night. When I called they kept saying they went to pick them up but refused to tell me which hotel they went to. Used another company the next day and had no problems.
